Dwarf: {"py/object": "modules.custom_classes.Race", "Race_name": "Dwarf", "Str": 2, "Dex": -2, "Con": 2, "Wis": 0, "Int": 0, "Cha": -2, "Height": {"py/tuple": [42, 62]}, "Weight": {"py/tuple": [150, 275]}, "Age": {"py/tuple": [20, 250]}, "Description": "Short and fat.", "Desc": "Dwarves are a short and stout people. They are very strong for their size and are as hard as the rock within which they make their homes. Even though they are by all accounts a subterranean race, their underground Kingdoms are full of light, music, and drinking. Especially drinking, Dwarves are very fond of drinking. Most Dwarves spend a good part of their lives above ground trading, adventuring, and fighting. Due to this, they don't suffer the paleness and light sensitivity of other underground races. They are a gruff people that are not normally friendly and have a tendency to be blunt to a fault. They also tend to be slow and deliberate in their movements, but when they do move they have the power of the mountain home behind them."}
